inclusion.criterion: patient admitted to pediatric unit in Assuit University hospital
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients with NPT above age of 6 years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with atrophic or vanishing testis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with previous failed laparoscopic orchiopexy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with empty scrotum at the right side. Diagnostic laparoscopy showed an abdominal undescended testis.
